mapper.update:
update otherstystem
timeToOne = #{timetoone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goOutAttendanceNo = #{gooutattendanceno,jdbcType=BIT},
systemId = #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where otherStystemId = #{otherstystemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from otherstystem where timeToOne = #{timetoone,jdbcType=INTEGER} and goOutAttendanceNo = #{gooutattendanceno,jdbcType=BIT} and systemId = #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteNo=0;
select * from otherstystem where systemId= #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteNo=0
mapper.delete: update otherstystem set deleteNO=1 where systemId= #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update staffclassesrecord set otherStystemId=#{nowOtherStystemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where workDate>DATE(NOW()) and otherStystemId=#{beforeOtherStystemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
